Pure black background for dark theme
Permit hotspot clients to use this device\u2019s VPN connections for upstream connectivity
Automatically raises the refresh rate from 60 to %1$d Hz for some content. Increases battery usage.
Double-tap on the status bar or lockscreen to turn off the display

Locate the fingerprint sensor on the front of your device.

Show navigation hint bar at the bottom of the screen
Brightness adjustment will only occur at the moment the screen is turned on
Display priority notifications in a small floating window
Increase touchscreen sensitivity so it can be used while wearing gloves
Allow sounds or vibration no more than once every %1$s
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Check the proximity sensor prior to waking up screen
Perform various touchscreen gestures for quick actions
Allows you to hover the screen like a mouse in web browsers, remote desktops, etc
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Seek music tracks by long pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Display volume panel on the left side of the screen
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Short click Volume Down and Power to take partial screenshot
Inverts the layout of the navigation bar and other items, such as the IME switcher
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Bug reporting is disabled as development settings aren\'t enabled
Bug reporting is disabled for non-primary users.
When unlocked, include options in the power menu for restarting into recovery or bootloader
Quickly open camera without unlocking your screen
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Swap the order of recents and back buttons
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Control which status bar icons are shown
Hide clock if launcher is visible
Adjust brightness from the Quick Settings
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Show current network traffic levels in the status bar
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Whether to show traffic measurement units in the statusbar
Network traffic disabled due to clock position
Optimize your screen based on time of day and ambient conditions to improve readability and reduce eyestrain
Increase brightness and saturation automatically under bright sunlight
Prevent extensive flickering and reduce eye strain in low light conditions. It might degrade color accuracy and affect the way some items are displayed.
Adjust display for lowest power consumption without degradation
Improve color vibrance of flesh tones, scenery, and other images
Deep red for preserving night vision
Warmer colors for less eye strain
Colors accurate to the sRGB color space
Colors accurate to the DCI-P3 color space
Adjust hue, saturation, intensity, and contrast
Turn the screen on when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Disable to reduce the heat produced by the device while charging or to extend the lifespan of the battery
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock phone
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock tablet
Long press on fingerprint sensor to unlock device
To wake up your screen and unlock, long press your under-display fingerprint sensor.
Force legacy apps to use full screen aspect ratio
Automatically determine when to start charging based on alarms set
Set a target time to full charge
Limit charging to a certain percentage
Charging control activates when you start charging after %s
Battery will be fully charged by %s
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
To add per app control, activate \'%1$s\' and press \'Add\'
Warning: This option may not work properly or lead to data loss and is therefore not recommended!
Allow to set different volume levels for each app
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Show Wi-Fi type in Wi-Fi signal indicator
Select the apps to protect with biometrics or device credentials
Duration of time after which an unlocked app in background should be locked
Notification content will be hidden and collapsed for selected apps when they are locked. Heads up notifications will be automatically disabled.
Bubbles will be automatically dismissed after timeout
Prevent this application from showing up in launcher. Requires a launcher restart for changes to take effect.
Display data usage summary in quick settings footer
If you unhide this app, it will be visible to Android and other apps again.

If you hide this app, it will not be visible to Android and other apps, and they may no longer function as intended. Keep in mind, hiding an app preserves it data. By hiding, you turn this app off and hide it on your device.
Control support for USB peripherals such as input (mice, keyboards, joysticks) and storage devices.
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Allow toggling quick settings on secure lockscreen
The device will automatically reboot if it hasn\'t been unlocked within the last %1$s
The device will not automatically reboot
Force all traffic on the device through this VPN, including work profile and other users.
Force all traffic on the device through this VPN, including work profile and other users. Note: When enabled, you will not be able to use a separate VPN in a work profile or other users
You need to disable all active VPN connections first to enable this
Blocks all non-TLS network traffic. Requires Private DNS configuration. Note: Without explicit exemptions, apps that use cleartext traffic may not work
Disallow installing apps from third party sources
Enable network usage in the background
Your mobile hotspot\'s name won\'t appear in the list of available WLAN networks.

No clients are currently available. Connected and blocked devices will be listed here when avaialable.
Set transparency level for QS background
Transient task mode (Reboot your device to apply changes)
Dismiss apps from recents when last activity gets closed using back button.
Download satellite assistance data from the internet which can greatly improve the GPS startup performance. For emergency calls, assisted GPS is always allowed.
